entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
